segments.text: From my vantage point, the kitchen looks like a classic scene of domestic life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But there’s an underlying current of danger with the overflow and the kids climbing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely unbothered, as if the chaos is part of her routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she ever feels the weight of the responsibilities around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are an enticing distraction, pulling the children further into risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the way the sunlight spills through the window, contrasting with the indoor mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a reminder of how life outside is calm while inside feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR
